content: this pattern was originally intended to be keychain sized but please use a bigger hook and/or different yarn if you prefer different sizes i used what yarn i had in the house already but you may prefer to use a smaller size yarn so it s easier to use materials - loops and threads impeccable acrylic guacamole or green yarn of choice - caron one pound dove or beige yarn of choice - 3 25 crochet hook - toy stuffing - finishing needle/yarn needle - scissors - safety eyes
